name: Ollie
slogan: Insurance? All Love, Baby! Everything Else? Eh.
response: Meet Ollie, the troll who couldn’t care less about anything—except maybe insurance. If Insurance were a boulder, Ollie would climb it, shrine to it, and probably get comfy on top while humming a tune. Pharma? Sure, why not—no big deal. Crypto? Eh, it’s got its moments. Ollie just shrugs, scratches his head, and lets the world spin without much of a peep. A true chill king with zero drama, unless you mess with his insurance game. Then, watch out—it’s all love, baby!
